name: chatgpt-source-watch
description: Analyzing the evolution of ChatGPT's codebase through time with curated archives and scripts
author: Glenn 'devalias' Grant (https://devalias.net/)

scripts.format:unpacked: npx @biomejs/biome format --write unpacked && npx prettier --write unpacked/**/*.css && npx prettier --write unpacked/**/*.css
scripts.wakaru:clean-chunk: f() { CHUNK="$1"; if [ -z "$CHUNK" ]; then echo 'Error: No chunk provided' >&2; exit 1; fi; rm -rf "./stage2-unpacked/${CHUNK}" "./stage3-unminified/${CHUNK}"; }; f
